freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 19th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 19th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).
